description: Sustained, visible rage state (lingering fury after a snap)
actor_description: The anger, it doesn't pass. It sits in my chest like pressure, hot and tight. I can feel my jaw locked, my hands itching to do something irreversible. Every second is restraint.
description_text: {actor}'s face stays flushed, jaw clenched; their hands flex and curl as their whole body holds a rigid, barely contained fury.

alternate_descriptions.auditory: I hear ragged breathing that never quite settles—words clipped short, like anger is taking up space in the throat.
alternate_descriptions.tactile: I sense a tense, vibrating stillness in someone's posture—like a coiled spring you can feel in the air.
